SEARCH

Package io.github.epadronu.dwalin.core

package io.github.epadronu.dwalin.core
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractionLayer
    Acts as the foundational layer for the Page and Component types, encapsulating their shared API.
    Component<P extends AbstractionLayer>
    Describes a reusable interface component that can appear multiple times across one or more pages or components.
    Dwalin
    Provides a set of utility methods for navigating to pages that implement the NavigablePage interface, along with other useful functionality for test automation.
    ElementComponent<P extends AbstractionLayer>
    Element-like version of a component that mimics the SelenideElement behavior.
    ElementGuard
    A SelenideElement facade designed for developers who prefer not to expose WebElement instances or WebElement-like behavior in the public API of their pages.
    GuardedComponent<P extends AbstractionLayer>
    A specialized version of a component that restricts access to WebElement instances and WebElement-like behavior in the public API of pages.
    NavigablePage
    Describes a web page that can be navigated to within a browser.
    Page
    Describes a web page, serving as the base of a page class implementation following the Page Object Model pattern.
